div.p: This value set includes the Patient to subscriber relationship codes.
Copyright Statement: This is an example set.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/relationship defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient is the subscriber (policy holder)
The patient is the spouse or equivalent of the subscriber (policy holder)
The patient is the child of the subscriber (policy holder)
The patient is the common law spouse of the subscriber (policy holder)
The patient has some other relationship, such as parent, to the subscriber (policy holder)

description.value: This value set includes the Patient to subscriber relationship codes.
